title: Masterchef's John Torode and Lisa Faulkner share wedding photos
text:
Advertisement

John Torode and Lisa Faulkner shared their first wedding pictures on Instagram on Friday.

The couple tied the knot on Thursday at the swanky Aynhoe Park in Banbury and Lisa looked incredible wearing an exquisite silk and lace gown as she held hands with her man.

Lisa, 47, captioned her image with the words: 'The happiest day of my life!!! Cue the wedding spam for the next few weeks! Apologies in advance.

'Officially married the girl of my dreams': John Torode and new wife Lisa Faulkner shared the first pictures of their wedding on Instagram on Friday, a day after they married at Aynhoe Park in Banbury

Love: The couple accompanied their snaps with touching messages after sharing their wonderful day with family and friends

'Yesterday I married the man of my dreams and we had the BEST Day EVER, filled with all our family and friends and such Love. Thank you we didn’t want to leave!'

John, 54, also shared a picture of himself lifting Lisa up in the air with an equally moving caption.

He wrote: 'Officially married the girl of my dreams yesterday @lisafaulknercooks what a day!! Thank you @aynhoepark photo courtesy of @jamesfearphotography.'

Magical moment: John also shared a picture of himself whisking his bride up in the air and they looked very much in love

Lisa carried a beautiful bouquet with orange, brown and pink blooms and wore shoes which perfectly matched her dress. John looked incredibly smart, wearing a navy suit.

The couple invited a host of their celebrity friends - and guests have also shared moments on social media.

Amanda Holden, 48, was pictured putting on a brave face as she walked around in trainers after breaking her leg in two places while on holiday.

The TV star looked incredible in her chic pink dress but looked pretty down in the dumps as she tried to put on a brave face with her crutches in hand, before posing for snaps with former Corrie star Charlie Condou and actress Tamzin Outhwaite.

Majestic: The stunning wedding location is a Grade I listed 17th-century country house rebuilt after the English Civil War on the southern edge of the stone-built village of Aynho, Northamptonshire

John Torode and Lisa Faulkner's wedding: Amanda Holden hobbled in trainers at the big day as she joined former Corrie star Charlie Condou and actress Tamzin Outhwaite (right)

The wedding reception was decked out beautiful with gold balloons adorning the rooms and giant inflatable 'BRIDE' balloons adding a touch of glamour.

Even a giant giraffe statue had balloons tied around its tummy and the bride and groom's wedding invitations had zebra illustrations adorning the words.

In place of a champagne tower, John and Lisa arranged a tower of espresso martinis, interspersed with what looked like passion fruit martinis - and guests also tucked into oysters.

Gold! The wedding reception was decked out beautiful with gold balloons adorning the rooms and giant inflatable 'BRIDE' balloons adding a touch of glamour

A-list: Actress Angela Griffith was also at the wedding and looked stunning in a pretty floral dress

Mood: Even a giant giraffe statue had balloons tied around its tummy (left) and the bride and groom's wedding invitations had zebra illustrations adorning the words (right)

Bride Lisa, 47, - who has been engaged to her Masterchef star fiance since Christmas Day last year - excitedly shared an Instagram snap on Thursday morning as she prepared to finally tie the knot.

Dressed in her nightwear, the TV star beamed broadly to the camera moments before she began getting ready for her big day.

Alongside the lovely snap, she gushed: 'Good Morning! Very exciting day today'.

Happy man: John was pictured leaving the venue the next morning, wearing a big smile on his face

Happy couple: John and Lisa have been dating since 2015 and announced they were engaged in an Instagram post earlier this year. Lisa wrote: 'My gorgeous John completely surprised me on Christmas Day and asked me to marry him!'

Love: Charlie, who played Corrie midwife Marcus Dent, brought along his husband Cameron Laux (left)

Slurp: Guests also tucked into oysters at the reception as Masterchef star no doubt made sure they got the best food

Lads, lads, lads! Charlie posed with a host of handsome men, including Amanda Holden's husband Chris (far left)

Giving it everything: The bride and groom had a percussion ring lit up with blue and pink fairylights (left)

Sitting on a lavish chair amid her luxurious surroundings, the bride-to-be looked glowing in the make-up free image as she prepared to get dolled up for her nuptials to the TV judge, 54.

The pair, who have been dating since 2015, announced the proposal in an Instagram post earlier this year. Lisa wrote: 'My gorgeous John completely surprised me on Christmas Day and asked me to marry him!

'After waiting to tell our family when we got home we then had a few days just grinning at each other!! I'm so very happy to share our lovely news with you.

'Happy 2019 it’s going to be quite a year and I’m going to embrace every minute of it. All you need is love. Love is all you need.'

Earlier this month, the former EastEnders actress enjoyed a fun hen do at Soho Farmhouse with her pals - including Amanda, Angela and Tamzin Outhwaite.

The Holby City actress was feeling cheeky as she slipped into underwear to lark around in a bath before indulging in some cocktails and food at the upmarket venue.

Arrivals: Dressed in their finery, Gregg Wallace and wife Anne-Marie led the guests for the wedding of Gregg's MasterChef co-star

Bride-to-be: Lisa excitedly shared an Instagram snap on Thursday morning as she prepared to finally tie the knot (left)
description: John Torode, 54, and Lisa Faulkner, 47, shared their first wedding pictures on Instagram on Friday after tying the knot at the swanky Aynhoe Park in Banbury the day before.
